verses.name: Job 24:20
verses.text: The womb shall forget him; the worm shall feed sweetly on him; he shall be no more remembered; and wickedness shall be broken as a tree.

verses.name: Job 24:21
verses.text: He evil entreateth the barren that beareth not: and doeth not good to the widow.

verses.name: Job 24:22
verses.text: He draweth also the mighty with his power: he riseth up, and no man is sure of life.

verses.name: Job 24:23
verses.text: Though it be given him to be in safety, whereon he resteth; yet his eyes are upon their ways.
